alert.note: Alert for Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:19PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...AREAS OF BLOWING DUST AND STRONG WINDS BETWEEN PYRAMID LAKE AND GERLACH... At 715 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow from earlier thunderstorms between Gerlach and Pyramid Lake. This outflow likely has pockets of dense blowing dust, and will likely impact Highway 447 between Nixon and Gerlach through 830 PM with reduced visibilities. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and blowing dust with visibilities near one mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Areas of rough water on Pyramid Lake. Blowing dust could create hazardous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Pyramid Lake, Nixon, Gerlach-Empire, Sand Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Be prepared for a sudden increase in wind and rough water on Pyramid Lake. Travelers on Highway 447 could encounter rapid drops in visibility.

area.areaDesc: Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
